summary: The Citizen-Only Police Act of 2025 (COP Act of 2025) prohibits the allocation of federal funds to any law enforcement agency that employs non-citizens as law enforcement officers. The bill was introduced in the House of Representatives by Mrs. Cammack and referred to the Committee on the Judiciary. The bill aims to ensure that only U.S. citizens are employed in these roles, impacting funding for agencies that do not comply.
